title: Cabbage Stir Fry |Cabbage poriyal | Side dish
content:
Side Dish: Cabbage Stir Fry Servings: 3 Duration: 15 mins Any Indian meal contains Dal, curry, rice, roti, and curd itâ€™s so authentic and traditional to have a meal with different kinds of curries. Stir fry or poriyal is a side dish and it's made often in our daily lunch or dinner meals. Today, I prepared cabbage stir fry which has great texture and taste. Itâ€™s a super simple dish and anyone can cook ğŸ™‚ Let's start with Ingredients and follows the procedure Ingredients:
  • Cabbage â€“ 1/2 â€“ 500 gms â€“ finely chopped
  • Green chilies â€“ 3 - slits
  • Fresh coconut â€“ 1/2 cup
  • Salt â€“ 1 tsp
  • Coconut oil Â â€“ 2 tbsp â€“ Room temperature
  • Split yellow gram / Moong Dal â€“ 1 tbsp â€“ soaked â€“ 20 mins
  • Coriander leaves â€“ 1/2 cup â€“ chopped â€“ Garnish
  • Turmeric powder - 1/2 tsp
For Tempering:
  • Mustard seeds/ Avvalu â€“ 1/2 tsp
  • Cumin seeds/ Jeera â€“ 1 tsp
  • Urad dal/ Minapappu â€“ 1 tbsp
  • Bengal gram/ Senagapappu â€“ 1 tbsp
  • Curry leaves â€“ 8
Procedure: Pre-Preparation:Â  Moong Dal:Â 
  • Add 1 tbsp Moong dal in a bowl
  • Wash twice and strain water
  • Add freshwater ( 100 ml ) and soak moong Dal for about 20 mins
  • Keep it aside
Process of Cabbage Stir Fry:
  • Heat skillet pan over medium heat
  • Add oil,Â tempering, curry leaves, and green chilies
  • Saute 30 secs and add chopped cabbage
  • Saute few mins and add salt and turmeric powder
  • cover it with a lid and cook 2 mins
  • Next, add soaked moong Dal along with water, mix well and close with a lid
  • Cook more 2 mins and turn off the heat
  • Finally, add coriander leaves, mix well and cover with a lid and leaves 2 mins.
  • Next, serve it with Roti/ Rice
  • Happy cooking ğŸ‘©ğŸ»â€ğŸ³ & Enjoy your day ğŸ™‚
